titleStmt.title: Midas Plaied before the Queenes Maiestie vpon Tvvelfe day at night, by the Children of Paules.
titleStmt.author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Scarlet for I[ohn] B[roome] and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Bible
